text: 3|144|Arau muham'mada kerala ejana raachula; te'omra agata bahuto raachula atita haiche. Eteke yadi te'om mrtyubarana karae athaba nihata haya tente tomaloke prsthapradarsana karaiba neki? Arau yiye prstha pradarsana karaiba si ketiya'o allahara kono ksati karaiba noraaraiba; arau allahe anatipalame krtajnasakalaka puraskrta karaiba.
